title: New free champion rotation: Braum, Rengar, Varus and more!

replies.body:
The Free Rotation, Episode 5:

they gathered in a field, everyone from the free rotation who missed dfg. there stood a coffin, and next to that, a man dressed like a priest.

{{champion:268}} "we are gathered here today, to celebrate an item that we all knew and loved. deathfire grasp. he was our friend, and we shall miss him so. i will now open the floor up, to anyone who would like to say a few words."

{{champion:84}} "dfg, you were a great ally in battle"

{{champion:1}} "we would play all the time, he was great for feeding tibbers. i just press that button and let tibbers out and he had a full champion to eat."

{{champion:31}} "just imagine it"

{{champion:34}} "you let me freeze even brand dfg"

{{champion:63}} "fire beats ice silly bird, even without dfg, i shall melt all of you."

{{champion:113}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:34}}  **"o' really?"**

{{champion:63}} "i may have miscounted, annie, quick, send em some fire."

{{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} **"Pyroclasm tibbers"**

their attack failed harder than udyr trying to chase kalista.

{{champion:113}} "banshee's veil op, now, lets ice em."

{{champion:63}} {{champion:1}} **"AHHHH! looks like team flame is blasting off again."**

{{champion:268}} "now that thats over with, time to get back to, **SHURIMA!!!** *ahem,* sorry about that, i meant to say: time to get back to saying goodbye."

{{champion:82}} ~~"censored"~~
(mordekaiser has seen his new changes, do to the high amounts of profanity and metal puns, we have censored his reaction.)

{{champion:161}} "i have never seen someone speak so horrible, i did not need this information."

{{champion:103}} "i do miss dfg, but he was just holding me back, making me something i wasn't meant to be. we had some good times dfg, but i'm much happier now."

{{champion:134}} "no one bothered to ask how i was doing after he was gone. i mean, its not like i was known for deleting people with my ult or anything. **what about my needs!**"

{{champion:86}} "hey guys."

*"collective gasp"*

{{champion:99}} "brother, what are you doing here?"

{{champion:105}} "yeah, this is for people who built dfg only."

{{champion:86}} "you don't know this about me, but, **i needed dfg too!** he was the only way a tank with no cc like me could be useful late game. we had a hidden relationship, that is now gone, i will miss him so. besides, what are draven and mundo doing here?"

{{champion:36}} "mundo goes where he pleases"

{{champion:119}} "and draven pleases where he goes."

over on a nearby hill:

{{champion:16}} "so,  why aren't you down there? and what is in that coffin?"

{{champion:150}} "they said i couldn't come over unless there was a problem.
as far as the coffin goes, we found a working dfg, so i decided to get rid of it this way."

{{champion:16}} "cool, might as well talk about the free champions then."

{{champion:150}} "as always, quests make people happy. so i made rengar and kha'zix free at the same time. other than that, i just picked the sexiest champs around because i was bored."

{{champion:16}} "oh, looks like you might be needed soon."

back down at the funeral:

http://i.imgur.com/o3VzTLp.jpg

{{champion:45}} "its time, **TIME FOR YOU ALL TO BOW TO ME!**"

veiger opened the coffin and took out the deathfire grasp.

{{champion:113}} Hey! put that thing down right now, we are all grieving, it doesn't work anyways.

{{champion:45}} "i see your banshee's is on cooldown, i will show you how well dfg works. ZAP! PRIMORDIAL BURST!"

sejuani has been slain.

{{champion:412}} "souls, i came for the souls of sejuani and bristle.
only one? man i hate gingers."

{{champion:45}} **"NOW IT IS TIME FOR VENGEANCE."**

{{champion:150}} "guess i better call for backup."

I enjoyed the story, I too mourn the passing of dfg...but saying Sej is a ginger...is it ...just bothers me, I had this argument that lasted about a week about it, till I played aram with Sejuani and found the answer! 

if you play Sejuani on aram, Howling Abyss, the Shop Keeper says "**An Iceborn never truly dies**, except well, there are some exceptions..."  later he will say to Sejuani "**Iceborn blood is strong in you Sejuani!**"  THERE FORRR!!!  **Sejuani IS blonde** and only releases one soul because she is iceborn!  If you want proof look here http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3334798

I was playing and the ghost said these things...I nearly died of excitement, my friend was trying to convince me that Sejuani was in fact ginger...I wouldn't believe him.  Now I have proof!  :D
btw story was awesome made me laugh, saying Sej os a ginger has just become a pet peeve of mine, you're still awesome.  See you on the fields of Justice.  FOR THE FRELIJORD!!!

i don't take her hair color too seriously, i find the joke funny and like to use it when i can. but i am missing how iceborns are all blonde?

her hair color seems to vary, in her skins she has, black hair, white, ginger and blonde. so its hard to tell.
also, anyone who thinks i'm awesome is also awesome ♥.
Great Story! I completely died at Draven's line.

{{champion:13}} 100% more players mistakenly thinking Ryze is black
{{champion:110}} 30% more players staring at Varus's chest in champ select and wondering about their sexuality
I get JTMS reference. :)
What does Ctrl-l do?
Its an alternative to typing /joke or /taunt or something like that.

{{champion:51}} : *presses R*
{{champion:201}} : *presses E*
{{champion:201}} : "Good shot! You'll get them next time."
{{item:3070}} *there is never a next time* {{item:3070}}

I thinks it's because of their quest.
Yea i think that why ritos doing that
Its because of the quest, which is based on their lore together
{{champion:104}} + {{item:1039}} = {{champion:126}} WITH the new gillet pro turbo :v
So {{champion:104}}  can use a single blade and Gillette wants me to use 8 for a single shave?

Hey riot, can you change the {{item:3171}} {{item:3409}} {{item:3415}} {{item:3454}}  to a little buff? because its kinda unfair {{champion:121}}  gets a 2nd evo but {{champion:107}}  gets nothing now
they already did on the pbe :/
Kha is also exponentially worse then rengars and can't hold a candle to him in a 1v1
this is one of the best hero rotations cuz of {{champion:60}}  and {{champion:51}}

CAITLYN CAITLYN CAITLYN YAYAYAYAY. Get to play her more BEFORE I buy her. :D
You said it, i knew caitilyn was gonna be ftp! <3 {{champion:51}}
Same, I was like "Please be on rotation so I don't have to buy you before I play you more."
I couldn't sleep all night just thinking about it, i really wanted to try out cait so badly :D hmm now thinking about it i might as well reck noobs on my smurf acc xD {{champion:51}} FTW
Calm down.
You lost sleep over it? well then...
I Already got jinx, and officer Vi. now to save for cait and get the officer skin <3 {{champion:254}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}}

Wasn't {{champion:201}} on Free Rotation like 3 weeks ago? Wait, 3 sides to a triangle, {{champion:201}}  was free 3 weeks ago, there are 10 champions in a free rotation, 1-0=1, a triangle with 1 eye in the middle is... RITO {{item:2044}}  CONFIRMED!!!!!!!!!!
OH MY GAWD RITO HAS AN EYE!
LET THE HUNT BEGIN. {{champion:107}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:76}}
i litteraly just bought caitlyn now she is on the rotation

i have waited months nad months and months for {{champion:28}} and {{champion:60}} to be free and now they are one after another. praise rito, i finally get to complete my quest of trying every female champ
idk why but i am not surprised to see {{champion:121}} and {{champion:107}} together,again!!
